If you want to watch this at your full HD tv, do NOT download this crap.. it shouldnt even have the name 720p its like a dvdrip. Im useally not a complainer, but this is not 720p quality.  its watchable but a dvd rip aswell. A = 8, V = 6

Just wanted to say belatedly, though I downloaded this a few days ago, thanks for the upload. I decided to replace my current low-quality rips with these (and your seasons 1-3 and subtitles) and the downloads were incredibly fast!

The quality is great and it's ironically smaller in size than the AVIs I had before. I never really liked MKVs that much, but these have convinced me otherwise: great quality, good size, and the subtitles are a nice touch that makes these perfect. I feel like I missed a lot watching through this series the first time without understanding the Spanish dialogue!

Thanks again.
